statements: DELETE FROM tournament_brackets WHERE championship_year = 2021 AND playoff_round = 2;
DELETE FROM tournament_brackets WHERE championship_year = 2022 AND bracket_name = 'Finals Bracket';
DELETE FROM tournament_brackets WHERE playoff_round > 4 AND championship_year < 2020;
DELETE FROM championship_history WHERE year = 2020 AND team_name = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM championship_history WHERE year <= 2015 AND championship_type = 'World Cup';
DELETE FROM playoff_standings WHERE wins > 5 AND losses <= 3;
DELETE FROM playoff_standings WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM players WHERE team_id = 101 AND position = 'Forward';
